name: Magic ARena
description:
Welcome to the Magic ARena !
The World’s first game where you can use real objects as game items!

Just scan the objects on your battlefield through your camera and it will become a powerful tower that supports your team !

Collect and upgrade your characters though Character Cards, Spell Cards, Magic Chests and Special Events and Missions! Destroy the opponents tower and defend yours for more Victory !


An Augmented Reality real-time multiplayer battlefield starring adorable magical animals that will help you find your way to victory.

We will lead you through new experiences everyday through the
Magic ARena !


[Game Features]

● A casual PvP that can be played in REAL-TIME with players around the world. Experience the 1: 1 championship matchdown!

● Strike your opponent's tower, grab the boss, and collect the keys of good fortune! Collect 10 keys to open treasure chests that contain many rewards.

● You win a treasure box every time you win a battle! In the treasure box, you can get a new and powerful card, or you can collect cards you already own and upgrade them.

● At Magic ARena, a Vision Card is available that can be used to detect nearby objects. You can witness the incredible sight of REAL OBJECTS transforming to a powerful tower by scanning available objects . This feature is crucial to who wins Victory or Defeats!

● Vision spells are so powerful that if you summon them on the right time, you can lead the battle to your WIN! Make the best use of objects around you!

● In the Magic ARena, Units, Magic, and Vision Towers appear. Make your best battle deck and lead to victory!

● The more battle experience you have, the more powerful you get.

● Take daily and weekly quests to earn humongous rewards!



[NOTES]

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Information current as of July 1, 2019
- Compatible with iPhone® 5SE/ 6s / 6s Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 8 / 8 Plus / X/ XR / XS / XS Max devices with iOS Version 11.3 or later installed.
- Not compatible with 5th generation iPod Touch devices or iPhone 5s or earlier iPhone devices.
